Description: Grants a X-level cooling effect, raising your body's resistance to heat. Crucial for long journeys through the desert.
Grants a X-level resistance to electricity. Useful against enemies with electrical attacks.
Restores stamina and temporarily extends your Stamina Wheel. The additional stamina will disappear as it's used.
Restores your Stamina, which is used when performing physical actions such as climbing walls and swimming.
This powerful recovery elixir harnesses the power of fairies. It has a sweet fragrance.
Grants a fireproof effect, which prevents your body from catching fire. Be sure to pack this when venturing out to explore Death Mountain.
Grants a X-level haste effect, which boosts your movement speed while running, swimming, or climbing.
Restores you to full health and increases your maximum hearts. The additional hearts are lost as you take damage.
Grants a X-level increased attack effect, which boost the strength of your strikes. Best to use before facing difficult to defeat enemies.
Grants a X-level stealth effect, which calms the nerves and silences footfalls. Allows you to move about undetected by monsters and animals.
Warms your body from its core, increasing your resistance to cold environments. Very useful in the snow-covered mountains.
Grants a X-level toughness effect, which fortifies your bones to strengthen your defense. Best to use before facing off against hard-hitting enemies.
